Class MessagesBuilder

extends Object
    Builder for Messages objects.

      • name

        public MessagesBuilder name(String name)
        Specifies the bundle name (e.g. "Messages").
        Parameters:
        name - The bundle name.
        If null, the forClass class name is used.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • baseNames

        public MessagesBuilder baseNames(String... baseNames)
        Specifies the base name patterns to use for finding the resource bundle.
        Parameters:
        baseNames - The bundle base names.
        The default is the following:
        • "{package}.{name}"
        • "{package}.i18n.{name}"
        • "{package}.nls.{name}"
        • "{package}.messages.{name}"
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • locale

        public MessagesBuilder locale(Locale locale)
        Specifies the locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale. If null, the default locale is used.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • build

        public Messages build()
        Creates a new Messages based on the setting of this builder.
        Returns:
        A new Messages object.
